short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reading List - Save links, read later

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reading List is an extension designed for quickly accessing links you wish to save without cluttering your bookmarks. It functions similarly to the Chrome Reading List but offers the convenience of a shortcut (a popup) and a more user-friendly interface.

Features
• Reading List / Read List
• Mark as read or delete
• Links count
• Automatic dark theme
